1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj Asaf. Sb'itej jun b'it tic vin̈ cuchb'um d'a b'it yed' sjajil jun b'it sb'itaji ayic stec'jiel yal sat te' uva.</e> <pb/><t>Con̈ b'itanec d'a tzalajc'olal d'a Dios tz'ac'an quip. Con̈ avajec d'a tzalajc'olal sco b'itan co Diosal a on̈ yin̈tilal on̈ vin̈aj Jacob tic.</t>
2: <t>Con̈ b'itanec yed' pandereta yed' te' arpa vach' sc'an̈i yed' pax salterio.</t>
3: <t>Co puec q'uen trompeta ayic tz'alji q'uen uj. Co puec pax q'ueen ayic sc'ojnaj q'uen uj chi', yujto nivan q'uin̈ jun chi' d'ayon̈.</t>
4: <t>Aton jun checnab'il ix yac' Dios d'ayon̈ a on̈ israel on̈ tic, a on̈ yin̈tilal on̈ vin̈aj Jacob.</t>
5: <t>Ix alchaj d'ayon̈ yin̈tilal on̈ vin̈aj José tic, ayic ix b'at Dios oval d'a Egipto.</t> <t>Ata' ix cab' jun lolonel, palta man̈ cojtacoc mach ix lolon chi'.</t>
6: <t>Ix yalan d'ayon̈: Toxo ix vic'canel eyicatz d'a yich e patic. Toxo ix vic'canel jun munlajel te ya d'a eyib'an̈.</t>
7: <t>Ix in eyavtejcoti ayic ayex och d'a syaelal, a inxo ix ex in colo'. Ix ex in tac'vej d'a scal asun ayic sc'an̈ c'u. Ix ex vac' proval d'a a' yic Meriba.</t>
8: <t>Ex in chon̈ab', ab'ec tas svala', a in van in lolon d'ayex. Ex israel, octom tzin e c'anab'ajej.</t>
9: <t>Malajocab' sdiosal eb' ch'oc chon̈ab'il ayec' d'ayex. Man̈ eyaq'uem e b'a d'a juntzan̈ comon dios chi'.</t>
10: <t>A in Jehová e Diosal in, a in ix ex viq'uelta d'a yol yic Egipto. Jaquec e ti', ol ex in vatzitej.</t>
11: <t>Palta maj yal e c'ol ix in e c'anab'ajej a ex in chon̈ab' Israel ex tic.</t>
12: <t>Yuj chi' ix ex vactejcan yuj e pital, ix eyac'an e gana icha snib'ej e c'ool.</t>
13: <t>Ex in chon̈ab' Israel, octom ix eyab' tas ix vala'. Octom ix e b'eyb'alej in checnab'il.</t>
14: <t>Ix am vac'och yaelal d'a yib'an̈ eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayex. Junn̈ej am mutz'satil ix aj in satanel eb'.</t>
15: <t>A eb' tzin yajaneli, toxon̈ej am n̈ojoji yec' eb' yuj xivelal d'ayin. Axo syaelal eb', scan d'a yib'an̈ eb' d'a juneln̈ej.</t>
16: <t>Palta a exxo tic, ix am ex in vatzitej. A am val ixim trigo te vach' ix vac' d'ayex. Ix am vac' noc' yalchab' tz'elta d'a sattac q'uen q'ueen eyuq'uej yic tzex tzalaji, xchi Jehová.</t>
